turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to order a Starbucks drink in Coronado, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location in cornonado?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one closest to the naval base.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't know the exact address. I just know there's one that's close.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me find that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that the one on orange avenue?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good job.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a Grande.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular frappuccino.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with 2% milk and double whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, you are ordering a grande frappachino with 2% milk and double whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on orange avenue, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Enjoy being a computer.
